titles.title: Quality Teacher Recruitment and Retention Act of 2003
A bill to increase the amount of student loans that may be forgiven for teachers in mathematics, science, and special education.
Quality Teacher Recruitment and Retention Act of 2003

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: Quality Teacher Recruitment and Retention Act of 2003 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide for additional amounts of student loan forgiveness for certain teachers of: (1) mathematics and science in secondary schools; and (2) special education in elementary and secondary schools.
